data.title: What’s Leaving Netflix in July 2024
data.meta_description: Over 70 movies are leaving Netflix on the first of the month.
data.text:
Over 70 movies are leaving Netflix on the first of the month.

Kasey Moore · @kasey__moore

Welcome to another big rundown on everything set to leave Netflix, specifically in the United States, during July 2024. We’ll be covering all the movie and series whether they be licensed or Original titles set to expire.

For the first of the month, you’ll notice that many of the classic 1984 movies that were added on April 1st as part of Netflix’s “Milestone Movies” initiative are set to leave. These are only added on short-term licenses, and the next batch will be arriving on July 1st, which all were released in 1994. Pulp Fiction incoming!

We typically get word of removals around 30 days ahead of their departure. Netflix then releases its own abbreviated list of departures in the final couple weeks of the preceding month.

Missed any of the June 2024 departures? You can find the complete and most comprehensive list of removals here.

What are you disappointed to see leaving Netflix in July? Let us know in the comments down below.
